title: LP Still Bugged
body:
So, was Plat 3 with 90 LP. Lost a game in 8th, was then Plat 3 with 7 LP. I lost 83 LP in a single game, odd & a tad extreme. 
So, was Plat 3 with 33 LP, came 3rd (You decide if that's a win or a loss) Lost 33 LP. Odd.

replies.body:
The system is beyond broken when compared to the original design goal.

It was stated that anything 1st - 4th place was to be considered a win and that you would not lose LP.

That is not the case.

I asked this to a support member and he said it is implied that when you place 4th you are not guaranteed to gain/loss lp. Which means please interpret what we are saying cause we are to lazy to give you a fully detailed explanation
